title: Business VoiceEdge Audio Conferencing: Send Conference Invite

json.text: The business voice edge audio conferencing application allows you to quickly access your 15
participant audio conferencing service from the business voice edge companion or Comcast mobile app
From the companion select the audio conferencing icon
Your conference number personal conference ID and moderator pin will be displayed
Select share conference link to copy the dial-in information
Paste the conference link information into an email meeting invite or I am chat etc
participants can simply click the link they receive from you and will be routed to a web page where prompted to enter their name and
preferred phone number to use for the conference
Once information is entered the participants click join conference and the audio bridge will call that
Participants number to bridge them onto the call producing dialing mistakes that typically delay the start of conference calls
Additionally you can still share your conference number and conference ID and your participants can join your audio conference the traditional way
